story:
Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a young White boy named Oliver. Oliver was a kind, curious, and adventurous boy who loved to explore the world around him. He lived in a cozy little house at the edge of a vast, magical forest.

One day, as Oliver was playing in the forest, he stumbled upon a tiny, golden key. The key was so small that it could fit in the palm of his hand, and it shimmered and sparkled in the sunlight. Oliver had never seen anything like it before, and he felt a strong desire to discover what it unlocked.

He searched high and low, near and far, until he finally found a small, hidden door at the base of an ancient oak tree. The key fit perfectly in the lock, and as Oliver turned it, the door creaked open, revealing a secret world beyond.

Inside, Oliver found a beautiful garden, filled with vibrant flowers, lush green grass, and crystal-clear streams. He was amazed by the sights and sounds around him, and he spent hours exploring every inch of the garden.

As he wandered, he came across a group of animals, unlike any he had ever seen before. There were talking birds, clever foxes, and wise old tortoises. They welcomed Oliver with open arms and invited him to join them in their daily adventures.

Oliver soon became fast friends with the animals and spent his days learning from them, playing with them, and discovering the secrets of the magical forest. But as much as he loved his new friends, he knew that he couldn't stay in the magical forest forever.

So, with a heavy heart, Oliver said goodbye to his friends and returned to his cozy little house at the edge of the forest. From that day on, he knew that no matter where his adventures took him, he would always carry the memories of his time in the magical forest with him.

And as he drifted off to sleep each night, he would dream of the wonders that lay beyond the hidden door, and the friends who had captured his heart.

The end.

Now, my dear son, it's time for you to close your eyes and dream of your own magical adventures. Goodnight!
